## IControllerPointerDownEvent interface

Pointer down event for camera controllers.

Triggered when a mouse, pen, or touch pointer is pressed down.

**Signature:**

```typescript
interface IControllerPointerDownEvent extends IControllerMouseEvent<'pointerdown'> 
```
**Extends:** [IControllerMouseEvent](doc/markdown/./scene.icontrollermouseevent.md)<!-- -->&lt;'pointerdown'&gt;
